text: Mike Jimenez (born May 15, 1987) is an American professional boxer in the Super Middleweight division. Jimenez fought Jesse Hart for the USBA Super Middleweight title on the undercard of Mayweather-Pacquiao. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:American male boxers Category:Super-middleweight boxers
title: Mike Jimenez
